blocks.name: hauseqcn
blocks.content: In a Hausdorff topology, two continuous functions which agree on a dense set agree everywhere. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm hauseqcn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cha))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cres(c0, c5), cres(c1, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), c5), c2))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wss(cuni(c3), cdm(cin(c0, c1))))
  syl5eqssr(cuni(c3), cdm(cin(c0, c1)), c2, w0)
  3sstr3d(c2, cdm(cin(c0, c1)), cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), c5), cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), cdm(cin(c0, c1))), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), c5), cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), cdm(cin(c0, c1)))), wcel(c3, ctop), wss(cdm(cin(c0, c1)), cuni(c3)), wss(c5, cdm(cin(c0, c1))))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, ctop), wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  cntop1(c0, c3, c4)
  syl5sseq(cdm(cin(c0, c1)), cuni(c3), cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), w0)
  dmin(c0, c1)
  syl6eq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), cuni(c3), cin(cuni(c3), cuni(c3)), w0)
  ineq12d(cdm(c0), cdm(c1), cuni(c3), cuni(c3), w0)
  3syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), cuni(c3)), wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, c4)), wf(c0, cuni(c3), cuni(c4)))
  fdm(c0, cuni(c3), cuni(c4))
  3syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c1), cuni(c3)), wcel(c1, co(c3, ccn, c4)), wf(c1, cuni(c3), cuni(c4)))
  fdm(c1, cuni(c3), cuni(c4))
  inidm(cuni(c3))
  mpbid(w0, wss(c5, cdm(cin(c0, c1))), wceq(cres(c0, c5), cres(c1, c5)))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wceq(cres(c0, c5), cres(c1, c5)), wss(c5, cdm(cin(c0, c1)))), wfn(c0, cuni(c3)), wfn(c1, cuni(c3)), wss(c5, cuni(c3)))
  syl6sseq(c5, cuni(c3), c2, w0)
  fnreseql(c0, cuni(c3), c1, c5)
  clsss(c3, cdm(cin(c0, c1)), cuni(c3), c5)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), cdm(cin(c0, c1))), cdm(cin(c0, c1))), wcel(cdm(cin(c0, c1)), cfv(ccld, c3)))
  hauseqlcld(c0, c1, c3, c4, w0)
  cldcls(cdm(cin(c0, c1)), c3)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wss(cuni(c3), cdm(cin(c0, c1)))), wfn(c0, cuni(c3)), wfn(c1, cuni(c3)))
  3syl(w0, wfn(c0, cuni(c3)), wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, c4)), wf(c0, cuni(c3), cuni(c4)))
  cnf(c0, c3, c4, cuni(c3), cuni(c4))
  ffn(c0, cuni(c3), cuni(c4))
  3syl(w0, wfn(c1, cuni(c3)), wcel(c1, co(c3, ccn, c4)), wf(c1, cuni(c3), cuni(c4)))
  cnf(c1, c3, c4, cuni(c3), cuni(c4))
  eqid(cuni(c3))
  eqid(cuni(c4))
  ffn(c1, cuni(c3), cuni(c4))
  fneqeql2(c0, cuni(c3), c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hauseqcn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c3
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ Haus)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c3[Cn]c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(c3[Cn]c4))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 |` c5)=(c1 |` c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 →((cls ` c3)` c5)= c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 = c1, ⋃ c3 ⊆ dom((c0 ⋂ c1)))
  syl5eqssr(⋃ c3, dom((c0 ⋂ c1)), c2, w0)
  3sstr3d(c2, dom((c0 ⋂ c1)), ((cls ` c3)` c5), ((cls ` c3)` dom((c0 ⋂ c1))), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, ((cls ` c3)` c5)⊆((cls ` c3)` dom((c0 ⋂ c1))), c3 ∈ Top, dom((c0 ⋂ c1))⊆ ⋃ c3, c5 ⊆ dom((c0 ⋂ c1)))
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ Top, c0 ∈(c3[Cn]c4))
  cntop1(c0, c3, c4)
  syl5sseq(dom((c0 ⋂ c1)), ⋃ c3, (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1)), w0)
  dmin(c0, c1)
  syl6eq((dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1)), ⋃ c3, (⋃ c3 ⋂ ⋃ c3), w0)
  ineq12d(dom(c0), dom(c1), ⋃ c3, ⋃ c3, w0)
  3syl(w0, dom(c0)= ⋃ c3, c0 ∈(c3[Cn]c4), (c0 : ⋃ c3 → ⋃ c4))
  fdm(c0, ⋃ c3, ⋃ c4)
  3syl(w0, dom(c1)= ⋃ c3, c1 ∈(c3[Cn]c4), (c1 : ⋃ c3 → ⋃ c4))
  fdm(c1, ⋃ c3, ⋃ c4)
  inidm(⋃ c3)
  mpbid(w0, c5 ⊆ dom((c0 ⋂ c1)), (c0 |` c5)=(c1 |` c5))
  syl3anc(w0, ((c0 |` c5)=(c1 |` c5)↔ c5 ⊆ dom((c0 ⋂ c1))), c0[Fn]⋃ c3, c1[Fn]⋃ c3, c5 ⊆ ⋃ c3)
  syl6sseq(c5, ⋃ c3, c2, w0)
  fnreseql(c0, ⋃ c3, c1, c5)
  clsss(c3, dom((c0 ⋂ c1)), ⋃ c3, c5)
  syl(w0, ((cls ` c3)` dom((c0 ⋂ c1)))= dom((c0 ⋂ c1)), dom((c0 ⋂ c1))∈(Clsd ` c3))
  hauseqlcld(c0, c1, c3, c4, w0)
  cldcls(dom((c0 ⋂ c1)), c3)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 = c1 ↔ ⋃ c3 ⊆ dom((c0 ⋂ c1))), c0[Fn]⋃ c3, c1[Fn]⋃ c3)
  3syl(w0, c0[Fn]⋃ c3, c0 ∈(c3[Cn]c4), (c0 : ⋃ c3 → ⋃ c4))
  cnf(c0, c3, c4, ⋃ c3, ⋃ c4)
  ffn(c0, ⋃ c3, ⋃ c4)
  3syl(w0, c1[Fn]⋃ c3, c1 ∈(c3[Cn]c4), (c1 : ⋃ c3 → ⋃ c4))
  cnf(c1, c3, c4, ⋃ c3, ⋃ c4)
  eqid(⋃ c3)
  eqid(⋃ c4)
  ffn(c1, ⋃ c3, ⋃ c4)
  fneqeql2(c0, ⋃ c3, c1)
}
